comments.en: Cartridge containing toner and imaging drum

Low-end mono laser. 1200 ProRes, 18ppm, available as USB-only or with integrated network interface. PCL 5e and ZjStream.

For basic printing functionality use the "foo2zjs" driver. For advanced functionality such as printer status and maintenance features, use the HPLIP framework as CUPS backend and "foo2zjs" as printer driver.

Note that "foo2zjs" makes the printer printing much faster and more reliable than HPIJS, and it has a 1200x600-dpi mode wereas HPIJS (and other drivers for PCL 5e) have a maximum resolution of 600x600 dpi.
